Table 3: English STS. *We were able to reproduce the scores reported in the original Sentence-BERT (SBERT, 
Reimers and Gurevych 2019) paper. However, we found mean-pooling over all tokens (including padded ones) 
yield better performance (.754 vs .749). We thus report the stronger baseline.

Table 14: Full table for MVN and IS of word-, phrase-
, and sentence-level models. Higher is better, that is,

tion spaces).
